summary: Old professional killer Wagner seeks someone to teach what he knows as long as he is already dying, and he chooses Max, young and passionless thief to be his successor.
cast: Michel Serrault|Mathieu Kassovitz|Mehdi Benoufa|Robert Gendreu|Danièle Lebrun|François Levantal|Karim Belkhadra|Roland Marchisio|Félicité Wouassi|Nicolas Boukhrief|Donat Vidal-Revel|Philippe Neunreuther|Christophe Rossignon|Pascal Ondicolberry|Agnès Akopian|Isabelle Perret|Hélène de Fougerolles|Léa Drucker|Stéphane Metzger|Karim Adda|Philippe le Gall|Pierre Yves Lenik|Patrick Poivre d'Arvor
keywords: contract murderer|gunshot|murder spree|assassin|based on short film
title: Assassin(s)
